Meta-Model Interface¶

Domain objects are expressed in terms of the Meta-Model.

TBD

class prios_api.domain_objects.meta.Assertion(source: Optional[prios_api.domain_objects.meta.Entity] = None, target: Optional[prios_api.domain_objects.meta.Entity] = None, value: Union[bool, float, int, str, None] = None, confidence: Optional[float] = None, description: Optional[str] = None, attribute: Optional[prios_api.domain_objects.meta.Attribute] = None, context: Any = None, created_at: float = 1557202870.117476, uuid_id: <module 'uuid' from '/usr/local/anaconda3/lib/python3.7/uuid.py'> = UUID('2cc1745d-9d00-4304-a80c-e2486fd13933'))[source]¶

A generic Assertion object:

  • The “source” and “target” attributes should both be an Entity
  • The “value” should be some numerical value
  • The “confidence” should be some numerical value
  • The “description” should be a free-form text field
  • The “attribute” should be an Attribute
  • The “context” should be a list of Tags, Entities, etc that contextualize assertions
class prios_api.domain_objects.meta.Attribute(name: str, description: str, members: List[Attribute] = <factory>)[source]¶
class prios_api.domain_objects.meta.Entity(uuid: UUID('fd0b20a8-2e22-4a6a-b249-c8ee0cdb906e') = UUID('fd0b20a8-2e22-4a6a-b249-c8ee0cdb906e'), created_at: int = 1557202870.116277, members: List[Entity] = <factory>)[source]¶

A generic Entity object

  • This class is expected to act as a MixIn for Domain Objects
empty(attributes_to_keep: List[str])[source]¶

Filters data from instantiated object (Not recommended for ad hoc use)
